channel.title: Selling customs to shops
channel.description: Hello, I was wondering how I can add customs to be able to be sellable to shops? In my server i have npcs dropping custom items yet players cant sell them to shops thus they sit and pile up in banks. Please could someone link me to a tutorial or show me that would be helpful!

item.title: Selling customs to shops
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

i have stated the price in item.cfg… btw its delta not pi… never even seen what a pie server looks like…

–

which type of method should i look for to post? any clues or tips?

Read full topic

item.title: Selling customs to shops
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

most likely the reason is because you don’t have it set in your prices.txt in your cfg files (for PI) not to sure about conversion. but its price isn’t stated therefore making it unsellable. try looking for a “sellable” method where you can add the item id of your custom item into

Read full topic

item.title: Selling customs to shops
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ghostly150:

Hello, I was wondering how I can add customs to be able to be sellable to shops? In my server i have npcs dropping custom items yet players cant sell them to shops thus they sit and pile up in banks. Please could someone link me to a tutorial or show me that would be helpful!

That’s a very odd error, but probably something as simple as being based on the item’s id.

Could you post your methods dealing with selling items? (Don’t ask me which ones those are, I don’t know every base).

Read full topic
